channel.title: Making underscores visible in chatbox
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm coding my own client and server. But there was something weird in the client, it doesn't show '_, >, < and ~' (+ some other symbols) won't show up when I typed them. I'm using Project Insanity as base.
I hope someone here could help me out :D.
[b]SalvationPk [/b]

item.title: Making underscores visible in chatbox
item.dc:creator: @SalvationPk SalvationPk
item.description:
@SalvationPk wrote:

Hey,

I’m coding my own client and server. But there was something weird in the client, it doesn’t show ‘_, >, < and ~’ (+ some other symbols) won’t show up when I typed them. I’m using Project Insanity as base.
